manage_email.title: Manage Your Email Addresses
manage_email.description: add, remove, verify or make an email address your primary one

add_email.title: Add an email address
add_email.description: add another email address to your account
add_email.success: You have added an email address

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: Apps and tools one can access via PressPass
clients.delete_confirm: Are you sure you would like to permanently delete this client? This action cannot be undone.

entitlements.title: Entitlements _changeme_
entitlements.description: Services you’re able to access based on the plans you’re subscribed to.

homepage.title: PressPass
homepage.lede: Get access to the most powerful tools for journalists with one, easy-to-use PressPass account.

cards.title: Access all of your tools in one place.
cards.body: With PressPass, you can use one account to login to the tools you use.

cards.title: Keep one digital identity everywhere you go.
cards.body: No matter where you end up in journalism, your PressPass account can follow you.

cards.title: Plug-and-play user authentication for news developers
cards.body: No one likes building user authentication systems. PressPass does it for you, and it integrates with all of your favorite frameworks.

cards.title: Bring your teams together on the same set of technology.
cards.body: With PressPass, news organizations can provide all of their employees with the same set of tools.

manage_profile.title: Manage Your Profile
manage_profile.success: Your profile changes have been saved.

toolbuilder.title: Toolbuilder Pitch
toolbuilder.description: Do you have a journalism project that you think should be included in PressPass? Tell us about it here.
